com.epoch.db

Class QuestionRead

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.QuestionRead
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, FormatConstants, TableQConstants, CaptionsQDatumConstants, QDatumConstants, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants

    final class QuestionRead
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants, CaptionsQDatumConstants, QuestionConstants, TableQConstants
    Instantiable class containing methods to read a question from the database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean addHeader
      Whether to add common question statements to these questions' statements.
      private Connection con
      Connection to the database (pooled).
      private boolean fullLoad
      Full or light (flags, question data only).
      private Map<Integer,String> headers
      Map of common question statements by question set IDs.
      private String instructorId
      Login ID of the instructor (null if master).
      private SQLWithQMarks qIdSelector
      Partial SQL query specifying which questions to choose from the database, and values to substitute for question marks.
      private Map<Integer,Question> qMap
      Map of questions by IDs.
      private DBTables tables
      Master or local database tables.
      private String[] userLangs
      Languages of this user in order of preference; null if English only.

      • getHeaders

      • getSingletonData

        private List<Question> getSingletonData(String orderBy)
                                 throws DBException
        Utility method to retrieve a question's singleton data such as statement, flags, etc. If translations are sought, will also populate the map of questions by ID numbers.
        Parameters:
        orderBy - how to order the questions
        Returns:
        true if at least one Q was retrieved successfully
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getEvaluators

        private boolean getEvaluators()
                       throws DBException
        Utility method to retrieve evaluators. Browses through the set with fixed qId, majorId and all minorIds.

        qId, majorId, minorId:
        10, 1, 0
        10, 2, 0
        10, 2, 1
        10, 2, 2

        Conditions: result must contain at least one element
        res must be sorted by qId, majorId, minorId

        Returns:
        true if no exceptions occurred
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

        Parameters:
        captionQIds - unique IDs of complete-the-table questions whose question data have been retrieved

        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
